column1: New Year's Eve Dinner Menu A$148
-20% off if you spend over €40 per person €40
New Year's Eve Dinner Menu A$148

Pre order one week in advance !!! NEW !!! 2.5 KG = 5.5lb SOUTH AMERICAN STYLE SEAFOOD FIESTA !!! NEW !!! WOW! Let’s do this! We have been looking forward to this for a very long time. 
It has Half Lobster, Crab Cluster, Langoustines, Prawns, Scallops, Mussels, Clams, Squid, Cod Fillet and Corn on the cob!
PHEW! All Together Marinated in Butter and Cajun. We will supply you with Bibs and Gloves… It’s going to be messy and you will love it…
( If you'd like to order more than one SEAFOOD FIESTA please leave a note on the message box during the booking process ) £120
New Year's Eve Dinner Menu A$148
